text: I also saw something like a sea of glass mixed with fire, and those who had overcome 15:2 the beast, his image ¦ the image, the beast K BYZthe beast, his image, 15:2 and the number of his name ¦ and his mark, that is, the number of his name, Αν TRand the number of his name were standing by the sea of glass, holding 15:2 harps from ¦ the harps of K ANT BYZ HFharps from God.
